name: Age of Wushu
description: Endorsed by martial artist legend and wushu champion Jet-Li, Age of Wushu is the world's first true Wuxia themed MMORPG, with cutting edge graphics and innovative gameplay. Players must journey to master the ancient Chinese art of Wushu, delving into their character's unique story and facing the consequences of every action without the crutch of MMO staples like levels and classes.
